headline: FDA AI/ML-Enabled Device Database Surpasses 950 Clearances
take: Milestone marks explosive growth in cleared AI diagnostics, but multi-modal fusion devices remain under 5% of total.

headline: Epic Expands Ambient AI Integration Across 12 EHR Modules
take: Largest EHR vendor betting big on embedded AI — signals that the orchestration layer is moving inside the EMR, not around it.

headline: Multi-Agent Pathology System Matches Tumor Board Accuracy in Retrospective Study
take: First large-scale evidence that chaining specialized foundation models can replicate expert panel consensus on complex oncology cases.

headline: LangGraph Clinical Workflow Templates Now Available for HIPAA-Compliant Deployments
take: Open-source agentic frameworks are closing the gap on clinical-grade requirements — expect rapid prototyping of multi-agent clinical pipelines.
